item.description: Moving to Ireland at 35 changed my relationship with coffee completely. Back in Dubai, I barely touched the stuff â€“ maybe it was the heat, or just different habits. But Ireland’s coffee culture? It pulled me in fast. Soon I had a routine: morning coffee from the local shop, another at the office before our daily sprint (essential for staying awake during those early meetings), and one more from “Seven Wonders” on my walk home.
